entry.source: {F812}Baker\0{F87A,23}{F813,0,628000}*sigh* ...I don't understand{F801}anymore... What's the point in{F801}living...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Baker\0{F87A,23}{F813,0,628000}*sigh* ...I don't understand{F801}anymore... What's the point in{F801}living...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Baker\0{F87A,23}{F813,0,628001}Huh? ...Oh. Hello. Yeah, sorry,{F801}but... I'm not baking bread anymore.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,628002}And you can't run a bakery if the{F801}baker doesn't bake. I've decided{F801}that I need to find knowledge.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,628003}You see... Academics is nothing but{F801}vanity, an effort by humans to make{F801}themselves less human. Or so I hear.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,628004}I want to... to learn more.{F801}I want to know everything I've been{F801}missing out on.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Baker\0{F87A,23}{F813,0,628001}Huh? ...Oh. Hello. Yeah, sorry,{F801}but... I'm not baking bread anymore.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,628002}And you can't run a bakery if the{F801}baker doesn't bake. I've decided{F801}that I need to find knowledge.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,628003}You see... Academics is nothing but{F801}vanity, an effort by humans to make{F801}themselves less human. Or so I hear.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,628004}I want to... to learn more.{F801}I want to know everything I've been{F801}missing out on.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Baker\0{F87A,-422}{F813,0,628005}So if learning things makes me less{F801}human... then it doesn't matter if I{F801}become a demon!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Baker\0{F87A,-422}{F813,0,628005}So if learning things makes me less{F801}human... then it doesn't matter if I{F801}become a demon!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Baker\0{F87A,-422}{F813,0,628006}What did I... do wrong...?{F801}Is it so wrong... to want to know...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Baker\0{F87A,-422}{F813,0,628006}What did I... do wrong...?{F801}Is it so wrong... to want to know...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Samurai\0{F87A,29}{F813,0,628007}Oh, {F843,0}. Good work. I'm glad we{F801}were able to execute that man before{F801}anyone else was affected.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,628008}Is it just me, or have there been a{F801}lot of cases like this recently? I{F801}hope it isn't some kind of ill omen...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Samurai\0{F87A,29}{F813,0,628007}Oh, {F843,0}. Good work. I'm glad we{F801}were able to execute that man before{F801}anyone else was affected.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,628008}Is it just me, or have there been a{F801}lot of cases like this recently? I{F801}hope it isn't some kind of ill omen...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A Samurai runs up to you...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A Samurai runs up to you...{F801}

entry.source: While talking to the baker,{F801}the baker turns into a demon,{F801}and proceeds to a battle.{F801}
entry.target: While talking to the baker,{F801}the baker turns into a demon,{F801}and proceeds to a battle.{F801}

entry.source: You have defeated the baker. A{F801}Samurai will come by and end the{F801}quest.{F801}
entry.target: You have defeated the baker. A{F801}Samurai will come by and end the{F801}quest.{F801}
